name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Poppin: The Social Layer of the Web

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make any webpage social. Chat, comment, and connect in real time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn any webpage into a social hub with Poppin, the internet's first social extension!

With Poppin, you can:

📌 Comment & Leave Your Mark:
Make your voice heard—share comments, reply to others, and upvote best content, all on the page.

💬 Chat in Real-Time:
Connect instantly with people visiting the same webpage.

🎙️ Host or Join Voice Spaces:
Lead or participate in live audio discussions tied to the page you're on.

----------------------------------------------  

Your Web, Upgraded

🚀 Plug & Play: 
Start with just one click—no integration required.

🛡 Privacy First: 
Your data is yours. We don’t store your browsing history.

🌍 Works Everywhere:
News, shopping, or gaming—Poppin works seamlessly across the web.

Ready to connect?
Make the internet more social, one page at a time. Try Poppin today!
